text: Gardone Riviera (Gardesano: ) is a comune in the Province of Brescia in the Italian region of Lombardy. It is on the western shore of Lake Garda. == Twin towns == Gardone Riviera is twinned with: * Arcachon, France, since 1980 * Pescara, Italy, since 2010 == References == Category:Settlements in Brescia
title: Gardone Riviera
